Detailed Description

template<typename F>
class UTimerEv< F >

UTimerEv event object.

This is just a special case of event that is fired only when a timeout is reached. It's just a shortcut to:

 UEvent(-1, 0, handler);
Note:
This event can't EV_PERSIST.
See also:
timer< ccallback_type >
